pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, July 5, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Greater Toronto Area, Ontario

Private meetings

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion on gun violence with community leaders. Vice-Chairman and President of the Toronto Raptors and Giants of Africa Co-Founder Masai Ujiri will also be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the event

2:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Toronto, John Tory.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting
